description:
An intuitive video editor for every skill level.

Filmora is an intuitive video editor for every skill level. Filmora makes it easy for anyone to be creative. Jump into an editing experience where advanced features are simple and fun. We got rid of repetitive tasks so you can devote your energy to your imagination. Get inspired by Filmora, an editor designed for creators like you.
1. Speaker Detection
Identify and distinguish multiple speakers within an audio file, helping you locate and label sections of speech related to each speaker.
2. Path Animation
Curved text supports path animation, which allows text to follow a specific trajectory or shape along a defined path.
3. AI Translation Optimized
AI Translation supports translation into Chinese Mandarin, leveraging advanced artificial intelligence to provide accurate and efficient translation.
4. Fix bugs and experience problems.
